name: deepl-translator
description: This module provides promised methods for translating text using DeepL Translator (https://www.deepl.com/translator) undocumented API.

scripts.release:major: generate-changelog -u https://github.com/vsetka/deepl-translator -M && git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit -m 'updated CHANGELOG.md' && yarn version --new-version major && git push origin && git push origin --tags
scripts.release:minor: generate-changelog -u https://github.com/vsetka/deepl-translator -m && git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit -m 'updated CHANGELOG.md' && yarn version --new-version minor && git push origin && git push origin --tags
scripts.release:patch: generate-changelog -u https://github.com/vsetka/deepl-translator -p && git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit -m 'updated CHANGELOG.md' && yarn version --new-version patch && git push origin && git push origin --tags

author: Vladimir Setka <vsetka@gmail.com>
